text: [oF 3 Multiple Choice Type | Award: 1 | Penalty: 0.3333 Computer Networks Consider a 1 Mbps satellite channel with 50 ms round trip propagation delay. We want to send a 1000 bit frame, and we will not send a second frame until we receive acknowledgment for the first frame. What fraction of the available bandwidth are we using? A.1/40 B.1/51 c.1/2 D.1/5 Your Answer: Correct Answer: B
